EXCEPTIONS.INTERNAL_ERROR: Woops, we got an error in the backend, please try again. If it keeps failing please check the logs for more details.
EXCEPTIONS.NOT_FOUND: Oops, didn't find what you are looking for.
EXCEPTIONS.TOKEN_FAILED: Getting Emby token failed. Please check your credentials and address.
EXCEPTIONS.EMBY_CALL_FAILED: Call to Emby server failed, please check if Emby is running and if the credentials are still correct.

FORM_ERRORS.NAME_REQUIRED: Fill in your name or nickname.
FORM_ERRORS.EMBYADDRESS_REQUIRED: Fill in your Emby address ip.
FORM_ERRORS.EMBYUSERNAME_REQUIRED: Fill in your Emby admin username.
FORM_ERRORS.EMBYPASSWORD_REQUIRED: Fill in your Emby admin password.

WIZARD.CROWNDINHELP: If your language is not mentioned or not complete, feel free to help me translate the app in your langauge on Crowndin
WIZARD.INTROTEXT:
Welcome to the EmbyStat server wizard.

With this wizard we will setup the basic settings so you can start working with EmbyStat without to much headache. When the wizard is completed you can enjoy all features of the server. If you want to tweak the server some more you can always go to the settings page.

For now we just need to know how we may call you and in what language you want view the UI.
WIZARD.EMBYNOTFOUNDTEXT: Now we will setup your Emby connection. We tried to auto detect your Emby server in the network but failed. Fill in all fields so EmbyStat can find your Emby server.
WIZARD.EMBYFOUNDTEXT: We found an Emby server in your network and entered the url already in the form. Feel free to adjust this and fill in the rest of the form.
WIZARD.PLUGININSTALLED: EmbyStat plugin found on Emby server
WIZARD.SAVINGINSTRUCTIONS: If something fails, you can't start using EmbyStat. In that case, fix the errors, press back and next.
WIZARD.FINISHED: All settings are saved and you can start using Emby server now. Enjoy your new statistics!
WIZARD.FINISHEXPLANATION: Best thing to do first is start a media synchronization task. EmbyStat will start downloading all data from your Emby server. Keep in mind that this task can take a long time depending on your collection size. If you don't want to start a syncronisation ride now just click finish. You can start it manually later by navigating to the Tasks page.

GENERAL.TVDBAPIKEY: If you want you can supply EmbyStat with your own TheTVDB API key here.
GENERAL.TVDBAPIKEYWARNING: Make sure you supply a working API key! If the key is incorrect the synchronization task will fail.

MOVIE.TOSHORTTEXT: To find the movies that are suspiciously short we need to know what the amount of minutes you find to short for a movie. Default this is set to 10 minutes but you can change it if needed.
MOVIE.COLLECTIONTYPES: Select all Emby collection types that you want to be able to select in the collection dropdown on the movie statistics page.

SHOW.COLLECTIONTYPES: Select all Emby collection types that you want to be able to select in the collection dropdown on the show statistics page.

EMBY.NOPASSWORD: Don't forget to enter your Emby password when you want to change the Emby url settings.

UPDATE.TRAIN: Change the update train if you want to have beta updates.
UPDATE.ONBETA: You are not on the Master train anymore so you can't switch back to it. If you want to go back on the master train, please reinstall the server.
UPDATE.TRAINWARNING: Here you can change the update train from master to beta. If you don't know what you are doing just leave this setting on Master. If you want to receive the Beta updates change it here, be aware that you can't go back to Master later. You will have to reinstall the server.

INFO.PINGEMBYSERVERDESCRIPTION: Ping the Emby server to check if he is still online.
INFO.SMALLEMBYSYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform a small sync with Emby server. This is a fast and small system update only.
INFO.MEDIASYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform an incremental sync for your movie collection. This can take some time to run!
INFO.CHECKUPDATEDESCRIPTION: Checks for new updates on your selected update train.

NOMOVIETYPEFOUND.TITLE: No movies found
NOMOVIETYPEFOUND.BODY: We couldn't find any movies in the EmbyStat database. If you have movies in Emby you should try starting a new media syncronisation task.

NOSHOWTYPEFOUND.TITLE: No shows found
NOSHOWTYPEFOUND.BODY: We couldn't find any shows in the EmbyStat database. If you have shows in Emby you should try starting a new media syncronisation task.

MEDIASYNCTASKRUNNING.TITLE: Media sync task is running
MEDIASYNCTASKRUNNING.BODY: The media syncronisation task is running in the background. Because of this all statistics pages are block because the calculations would be completely wrong as long as the sync is running.

EDIT_TRIGGER.FORMAT_ERROR: Given cron string is in a wrong format. Check here for formatting rules. Only numbers, spaces, *, / and - are allowed.
EDIT_TRIGGER.CRON_HELPER: Here you can find more information on how to format a CRON string. Only numbers, *, / and - are allowed.

LOADER.UPDATINGSUB: Page will refresh when the update is finished.

TOOLBAR.ONEMISSEDPING: Couldn't connect to Emby on the last check!
TOOLBAR.MOREMISSEDPINGS: Couldn't connect to Emby after multiple attempts!

THANKS.TEXT: A big thanks to the following people for translating the app in their native language:
